translation.ja: 助かる　ヤバい状況でね

translation.en: I think Jack is dead.
-Jesus. -[Henry] Yeah.
-Anyone follow you? -Nah.
They will. Let's go.
-Can I have one of those crackers? -[Danny] Sure.
[Baron] Thanks.
[principal] Does he do this at home?
-I don't think so. I don't know. Do you? -No.
translation.ja: さあね　どうなんだ？ しないよ

translation.en: [principal] If it's inappropriate to do this sort of thing at home,
why would you think it's appropriate
-to do it in your science class? -[cell phone buzzing]
translation.ja: なぜ科学の授業中に？ 授業がつまらないので

translation.en: I don't know. Probably because science is so wicked boring.
translation.ja: 授業がつまらないので

translation.en: Hello.
[Henry] Guess you really didn't want me to retire.
-Henry, you're okay! [chuckles] Thank God! -[Henry] Stop it.
translation.ja: ヘンリー　無事か！ よせ！

translation.en: Is Marino dead?
[Del] Yes.
Jack Willis?
[Del] It wasn't me. None of this was me, Henry. I swear.
translation.ja: 誓うが私の命令じゃない

translation.en: -I trusted you, Del. -[Del] You still can.
translation.ja: 信じてたのに 私は君の味方だ別の電話で掛け直す

translation.en: Let me call you on another line.
translation.ja: 私は君の味方だ別の電話で掛け直す

translation.en: 604-555-0131. You got 30 seconds.
Um, hey, excuse me. Could I borrow your phone for five minutes if I give you a hundred bucks?
translation.ja: 携帯を５分 貸してくれ100ドル払うから

translation.en: We'll start with whose idea it was to send a team to Agent Zakarewski's apartment.
translation.ja: ダニーのアパートに暗殺チームを送り込んだろ？

translation.en: -Was that necessary? -Also not my call.
translation.ja: ダニーのアパートに暗殺チームを送り込んだろ？ 私じゃない　彼女は⸺

translation.en: She's working for the inspector general, not me. Is she with you?
translation.ja: 私じゃない　彼女は⸺ 長官の直属だ

translation.en: Yes. Not voluntarily.
[Del] Okay, listen. This is not something I wanna say over the phone.
translation.ja: 今 ここでは話せない息子の学校に来てるんだ

translation.en: -I'm at my kid's goddamn school. -What the hell is all of this?
translation.ja: 今 ここでは話せない息子の学校に来てるんだ 詳しく説明しろ！

translation.en: We have a problem.
Gemini.
translation.ja: ジェミニが関わってる

translation.en: Your old friend, working with Janet Lassiter and her people.
translation.ja: ジェミニが関わってる 君の旧友とラシターが暴走を始めた

translation.en: I can't stop them.
translation.ja: 君の旧友とラシターが暴走を始めた

translation.en: Okay. Dormov.
Did-- did he have something to do with Gemini?
Dormov, the guy that you had me pop on the train, because you said he was a Russian terrorist.
translation.ja: テロリストだと聞いたから俺は指示どおり暗殺した

translation.en: Was he working for Gemini?
translation.ja: 奴はジェミニの関係者か？

translation.en: [Del] Once upon a time.
So you got me pulling... triggers for Clay Verris.
translation.ja: 暗殺はヴェリスの指令か？

translation.en: [Del] Henry, I regret my lack of candor, but listen--
translation.ja: 隠していて悪かった　だが…

translation.en: How many other times you do this to me, Del?
How many times you spike a file, send me off to AMF somebody who didn't deserve it?
translation.ja: 資料を改ざんし無実の人間を俺に殺させた？

translation.en: Never ever. This was a one-off. I swear on my son's life.
translation.ja: 今回だけだ息子の命に懸けて誓うよ

translation.en: All right. Look, Agent Zakarewski is not a part of this.
translation.ja: ザカレウスキー捜査官は無関係だ

translation.en: Henry, we can fix this, I swear. But I need both of you to come back.
translation.ja: 誤解は解くから⸺ ２人ともＤＩＡに戻ってくれ

translation.en: To what, Del?
Okay. Gemini.
translation.ja: ジェミニね　聞いてる

translation.en: What do you know about it?
Privatized paramilitary owned by Clay Verris.
translation.ja: ヴェリスが所有する傭兵会社

translation.en: Agency does a lot of business with them. Is there more?
Baron and I served under Verris in the Marines. Uh, Panama, Kuwait, Somalia.
translation.ja: バロンと俺は海兵隊でヴェリスの部下だった

translation.en: After he left the military, he started Gemini, and tried to hire us. We both told him no.
translation.ja: 退役後 ジェミニへの入社を誘われたが断った

translation.en: Except I was smart enough to move 1,500 miles away.
translation.ja: 俺も断り 国外に出た

translation.en: Yeah. -I blew that one. -[dramatic music playing]
[Henry] Verris gets billions of dollars a year to take out targets any way he sees fit.
translation.ja: ヴェリスは暗殺を請け負い巨万の富を築いた

translation.en: That's Gemini. Off-book kidnappings, tortures.
translation.ja: ジェミニが関わってきたのは誘拐に拷問⸺

translation.en: They're who you call when you need 12 Saudi princes to quietly disappear
translation.ja: 12人のサウジの王子が謎の失踪をとげた事件

translation.en: or you want somebody to train your death squads.
translation.ja: “殺人部隊”の訓練教官の手配

translation.en: Six weeks into sniper school, Clay Verris takes me out on this boat about five miles.
translation.ja: 奴は狙撃訓練６週目の俺をボートで沖に連れ出し⸺

translation.en: Ties these weights to my ankles, tosses me overboard, tells me tread water as long as I can.
translation.ja: 足に重りをつけて海に沈め延々と立ち泳ぎをさせた

translation.en: -And he didn't know about your fear of-- -Of course he did. That was the point.
translation.ja: 水が怖いのに？ だからこそだ

translation.en: So what did you do?
I tread water for as long as I could.
And then I drowned.
Dead.
He fished me out, paddled my chest.
translation.ja: 引き上げられＡＥＤ処置され⸺

translation.en: Told me I was now ready to serve under his command.
translation.ja: “これで俺の命令に従うだろう”と言われた

translation.en: [Baron] A toast.
To the next war... -which is no war. -[Henry] Which is no war.
translation.ja: 戦争のない明日を願って

translation.en: [Danny] No war.
[Henry] Yeah. We'll figure it out in the morning. -Right now, we could use some shut-eye. -Sure.
translation.ja: 話は明朝だ　少し眠ろう

translation.en: -Uh, you folks want one room or-- -Two.
translation.ja: ああ 部屋は１つでいい？ ２つよ

translation.en: Two. Two.
Well, yeah. I can put him in the garage if you want.
[Henry] All right, two rooms will be fine.
[Baron] Just giving you options. Okay, right this way.
translation.ja: 冗談だよ　こっちだ

translation.en: Sniper. Rooftop. I leave, he's gonna follow.
translation.ja: 狙撃手が屋上に　俺が行く

translation.en: I need you to go with Baron someplace safe. All right.
translation.ja: バロンと安全な場所に行け

translation.en: Shooter. On the roof.
You're a shitty house guest, you know that?
-How the hell did they find us? -She's good.
translation.ja: なぜバレた？ ダニーは優秀だが状況を把握してない

translation.en: She's really good. She just doesn't know what she doesn't know.
translation.ja: ダニーは優秀だが状況を把握してない

translation.en: Take care of her, all right?
[Henry] Stop right there!
Who are you?
I don't want to shoot you!
[Junior] Fine.
Don't shoot me.
Mind if I shoot you?
I could've killed you on the roof!
[Junior] Maybe you should have.
Did they show you a picture of me?
Yeah. You look old.
Kid... you take one step closer... you're gonna leave me no choice.
translation.ja: 小僧　一歩でも前に出てみろ命はないぞ

translation.en: -Stop! Stop! Stop! -[gunshot firing]
[Henry] Move! Move!
-[car honking] -[Henry] Out of the way!
[Henry] Stop! Stop! Stop!
Who the hell was that?
[policeman] Brogan.
Thank you, sir. -Thank you, Captain. -[captain] No problem.
Your place is burned. Get me somewhere I can see him coming.
translation.ja: お前の家はバレた奴は必ず現れる

translation.en: [Baron] I wanted to go in there guns blazing, but she thought the diplomatic approach made more sense.
translation.ja: 警察を襲う救出プランはダニーに反対された

translation.en: [Henry] Yeah, gunfire might've been kinder.
translation.ja: 撃たれてりゃ ラクだった

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Great work in there.
-[Baron] What now? -I need you to get me to Budapest.
translation.ja: それで？ ブダペストに行く

translation.en: -[Baron] What's in Budapest? -[Danny] What's in Budapest?
Jack's informant... Yuri.
translation.ja: 情報屋のユーリに会う

translation.en: Uh, these guys aren't... trying to kill me because I want to retire.
translation.ja: 奴らが俺を狙うのは引退がらみじゃない

translation.en: They're coming after me because they think Jack told me something classified.
translation.ja: ジャックが俺に秘密を漏らしたと⸺

translation.en: Yuri ought to know about it.
I'm sorry, partner, my Aztec doesn't have that kind of range.
translation.ja: 俺の飛行機では長距離を飛べない

translation.en: Well, I was hoping we'd borrow something that does.
translation.ja: 別の飛行機を借りよう

translation.en: Maybe a G?
Whoa! Taking someone's Gulfstream?
translation.ja: ガ(Ｇ)ルフストリームを借りる気か？

translation.en: I mean, you-- you'd really have to love a guy to do that.
translation.ja: そんな太っ腹な奴がどこに？

translation.en: I know just the feller. Give me a minute.
[Danny] Henry?
Did you ever have a kid?
[Henry] No. Why?
Guy on the motorcycle.
Did you notice anything funny about him?
-I noticed he was very good. -Right.
And the face?
Similarity?
Yeah, I noticed that, too.
...you never had a long-term relationship?
translation.ja: 長く付き合った彼女は？

translation.en: No. Not unless we count you.
translation.ja: いないね　君が一番 長い

translation.en: Is it possible that you could've had a kid without knowing it?
translation.ja: 知らない間に生まれた子は？

translation.en: [Henry] No.
-Then how do you explain-- -Danny.
All right?
Thank you, by the way.
For?
For leaving Baron's apartment so I wouldn't be a target.
translation.ja: バロンのアパートでの襲撃も⸺

translation.en: Coming to get me in Georgia when you could've just run for your life.
translation.ja: ジョージアでも助けてくれた

translation.en: I just...
wanted to put you on a private plane, and give you a free trip to Hungary.
translation.ja: 君と自家用機でハンガリー旅行をするためさ

translation.en: Where I'm gonna find...
Hungarians.
Right.
When I saw him...
it was like I was seeing a ghost.
translation.ja: 一瞬 ゴーストかと

translation.en: A ghost with a gun.
Like... every trigger I've ever pulled.
translation.ja: 今までに殺った奴らの化身かと

translation.en: [Clay] I told you to stay in Colombia and await orders.
translation.ja: コロンビアでの待機を命じたはずだ

translation.en: I wanted to talk to you.
[Junior] He's very good.
He's the best. That's why I sent you.
translation.ja: だから お前を送り込んだんだ

translation.en: He knew every... move of mine before I made it.
translation.ja: あいつ 僕の動きを全部 読んでいました

translation.en: I'd have him... right there, and I'd take the shot...
translation.ja: 狙いをつけて引き金を引くと⸺

translation.en: and... he'd be gone.
Like a ghost.
Did you get a look at his face?
Not really. I-- I saw him up the stairs, through a dirty mirror.
translation.ja: 階段の汚れた鏡に映った顔なら見ました

translation.en: I thought you were on the roof.
I was. He got a line on me.
-I had to jump down. -What do we always drill?
translation.ja: 狙われて飛び降りた 教えただろ？

translation.en: You hold the high ground. You put his back against the wall, and you don't let him go.
translation.ja: 敵より高い位置から相手を釘付けにしろと

translation.en: I know that.
The whole thing was weird. It was... wiggy.
translation.ja: いつもと違って頭が混乱して…

translation.en: How?
I don't know, it was as if I were... watching it all.
translation.ja: 自分がすべての状況を見ているようでした

translation.en: Who is he?
Junior, this thing that you're struggling with, this strangeness, it's fear.
translation.ja: お前の心を乱してるその気持ちは恐怖だ

translation.en: Don't hate it.
Lean into it. Embrace it,
translation.ja: 体を預け 受け入れるのだ

translation.en: and then overcome it. You... are right on the threshold, son.
translation.ja: あと一歩で お前は完璧な兵士になれる

translation.en: This close.
You hungry?
Um... yes, sir.
Bowl of cereal sound good?
Yes, sir.
[man 5 whistling] Thank you! That's it! Back up!
translation.ja: そこまで！　もう一度！

translation.en: Hurry up! -Everybody back to one. -[man 5] Everybody back to one.
translation.ja: 全員 スタート位置に戻れ

translation.en: -[man 6] Back to one! -[man 7] Let's go!
translation.ja: スタート位置へ　急げ

translation.en: Lots of new faces.
Yep.
They'll be the first boots on the ground in Yemen.
translation.ja: イエメンへの先行派遣隊だ

translation.en: Do they understand the rules of engagement or just, whatever moves, they shoot it?
translation.ja: 徹底した実戦訓練を？それとも⸺ 動くものを撃つ？

translation.en: They're elite. They're disciplined.
And if they get a clean shot at their target through an apartment window, they'll take it.
translation.ja: 建物の窓越しでも１発で敵を仕留める

translation.en: You should think about that on your way to Budapest.
translation.ja: ブダペストではドジるな

translation.en: Henry's just landed there.
translation.ja: そこにヘンリーがいる

translation.en: You're moving out.
[Danny] Aniko?
Thank you for your time.
Here are the samples.
This I can do for you in... two days.
This I need in two hours.
We got a meeting with Yuri. He agreed to sit with us.
translation.ja: ユーリと会う約束ができた

translation.en: You all right?
I think I know why he's as good as you, Henry.
translation.ja: 彼 スゴ腕は当然よ

translation.en: He is you.
What?
There's a DNA lab here. I gave them samples.
translation.ja: ＤＮＡ鑑定をしてもらったの

translation.en: Yours and the baseball cap he was wearing.
translation.ja: あなたの血液と彼の帽子で

translation.en: He just-- he looks so much like you, I thought he had to be your son, so I...
translation.ja: 似てるからあなたの息子かと

translation.en: They did three tests. Your DNA and his.
All three came back identical.
Not close. Identical.
As in the same person.
He's your clone.
They thought I'd made a mistake that I give them the samples of the same person, but I didn't.
translation.ja: サンプルは正しいのだから間違いはない

translation.en: He is you.
-How's that even possible? -It's complicated, but it's doable.
translation.ja: あり得ない 代理母とＤＮＡサンプルさえそろえば可能なのよ

translation.en: All you'd really need is a surrogate mother,
translation.ja: 代理母とＤＮＡサンプルさえそろえば可能なのよ

translation.en: -and a DNA sample. -If they could clone a person,
you-- you'd think they'd clone more doctors or scientists, not... me.
translation.ja: 俺なんかでなく 医者とか科学者の方がいいのに

translation.en: They could've cloned Nelson Mandela.
Nelson Mandela couldn't kill a man on a moving train from two kilometers away.
translation.ja: マンデラは列車の客を狙撃できないわ

translation.en: [Baron] Yuri.
Mr. Brogan.
[Yuri] Before we begin, I must confess, I have admired your work for many years.
translation.ja: 最初に白状するが⸺ あんたの仕事を前から尊敬してた

translation.en: [Henry] Wait. -So... you know who I am? -[Yuri laughing]
translation.ja: 俺のことを知ってたのか？

translation.en: A longtime listener, first-time caller, as they say in your country.
translation.ja: 遠くから見守ってたファンさ

translation.en: I would congratulate you... [grunts] ...on your retirement, but...
translation.ja: 引退を盛大に祝いたいところだが⸺

translation.en: your last job has loose ends, yes?
Yeah, well, my government lied to me, then tried to kill me
translation.ja: 政府が俺に嘘をつき殺そうとした

translation.en: -if that's what you mean. -Yes.
translation.ja: 政府が俺に嘘をつき殺そうとした ロシアじゃ日常茶飯事だがね

translation.en: In Russia, we call that "Tuesday."
translation.ja: ロシアじゃ日常茶飯事だがね

translation.en: But Americans... it hurts your feelings.
translation.ja: アメリカ人は傷つくだろう

translation.en: So...
So, why was Dormov trying to go back to Russia and why was I sent to kill him?
translation.ja: なぜ俺にドルモフを殺せという命令が？

translation.en: Yes, down to business. Very American.
translation.ja: アメリカ人は単刀直入だな

translation.en: You are a busy man.
We were both friends with Jack.
translation.ja: ジャックは俺たちの友達

translation.en: He was a good man.
I'm mourning his death, like you.
But the reason you are here... and I have not killed you... yet...
translation.ja: ここにいるお前を俺が まだ殺さないのは⸺

translation.en: is we share a common enemy.
translation.ja: 共通の敵がいるからだ

translation.en: Clay Verris.
He lured Dormov to the West, funded his lab.
translation.ja: ドルモフに研究をさせて⸺

translation.en: And now you have met the fruits of their labor.
translation.ja: 君は その成果を見た

translation.en: Dolly the sheep was cloned in '96.
translation.ja: 羊のドリーは1996年その前年は…

translation.en: -But in '95-- -I was the sheep.
translation.ja: 羊のドリーは1996年その前年は… 俺が羊だった？

translation.en: Take it as a compliment.
And you are the only one.
translation.ja: 人類で唯一 選ばれた

translation.en: With your DNA, Verris raised the boy as his own son.
translation.ja: ヴェリスは君のクローンを自分の養子に迎え⸺

translation.en: Trained him to be the perfect assassin.
translation.ja: 完璧な狙撃者に育てた

translation.en: So why was Dormov trying to leave?
translation.ja: ドルモフはなぜ脱退を？

translation.en: For years, we tried to lure him back. Nothing.
translation.ja: 彼は長年我々の元に戻らなかったが

translation.en: Then last year, they had a falling out.
translation.ja: 去年 状況に不安を覚え自ら助けを求めてきた

translation.en: -Dormov got scared, reached out to me. -So, I--
translation.ja: 去年 状況に不安を覚え自ら助けを求めてきた 俺に殺させようとした理由は？

translation.en: that still doesn't explain why I was sent to kill him.
translation.ja: 俺に殺させようとした理由は？

translation.en: We have indications Dormov made a breakthrough.
translation.ja: 彼はＤＮＡを操作することで⸺

translation.en: Modified human DNA. A path to mass production.
translation.ja: クローン大量生産への道を切り開いた

translation.en: But Dormov wanted soldiers to be stronger, smarter. Verris...
translation.ja: 肉体も頭脳も優秀な兵士を造ろうとしたが⸺

translation.en: Verris wanted something else.
translation.ja: ヴェリスには他の狙いが

translation.en: What something else?
[Yuri] Mr. Brogan...
you are the best at what you do.
But still you get tired.
translation.ja: そんな君でも疲労し迷いを持ち⸺

translation.en: You have fears, doubts. You feel pain, perhaps remorse.
translation.ja: そんな君でも疲労し迷いを持ち⸺ 苦悩し 心の責めを感じる

translation.en: You have a conscience.
This makes you human... but suboptimal as a soldier.
translation.ja: 人間性には必要だが兵士には不要なのだ

translation.en: Less than perfect.
Less profitable.
Clayton Verris is playing God with DNA.
translation.ja: ヴェリスは神になった気でいる

translation.en: He must be stopped.
If it's that dangerous, why not send a missile? Blow up his lab.
translation.ja: 奴の研究所にミサイルを打ち込めば？

translation.en: That is what we're doing.
Except you... are the missile.
translation.ja: ただし そのミサイルは君だ

translation.en: I wish you luck.
Oh, one last thing.
Your escape from home two days ago? [exhales sharply]
translation.ja: ２日前のアメリカからの逃走劇

translation.en: Amazing work. I was on the edge of my seat.
translation.ja: スリル満点だった 手に汗 にぎったよ

translation.en: Wait. What? How the hell do you know about that?
translation.ja: 何だって？なぜ知ってるんだ？

translation.en: I'm a big fan. What can I say?
translation.ja: 君のファンだと言ったろ？

translation.en: [Danny] If even half of what he's saying is true...
translation.ja: 彼の話が半分 本当でも⸺

translation.en: we gotta talk to this kid. You're not gonna be safe until you do.
translation.ja: あの若者と話をしないと

translation.en: Oh, so you think if your 50 year old self showed up, and told you you were her clone, that would make you calmer?
translation.ja: 50歳のジジイが“お前は俺のクローンだ”と伝えるのか？

translation.en: Fifty-one.
-What? -Just saying...
-You know you're 51, Henry? -I'm aware of it.
translation.ja: お前は51歳だ 分かってる

translation.en: Right.
He's the mirror you don't want to look into, Henry.
But he's our best shot at getting to Verris.
[man] Janet Lassiter?
Who wants to know?
Got a message for you, ma'am...
from a man who transferred a 1,000 dollars into my Feathercoin account just to make sure you got it. [exhales]
Does this person have a name?
His name is "A 1,000 Dollars Into My Feathercoin Account."
"Hello, Janet. Before you try to kill me again, consider this.
translation.ja: “俺を殺そうとする前に言っておく”

translation.en: Your home address is 1362 Carrol Grove.
translation.ja: “あんたの自宅はキャロルグローブ”

translation.en: The security alarm code is 1776.
You awaken at 6:12 every morning,
and stop for your decaf soy latte with an extra shot by 6:42.
translation.ja: “６時42分までにソイラテを注文”

translation.en: Every night you stand in front of your huge living room window,
sipping a Jose Cuervo margarita... with Forensic Files on the TV...
translation.ja: “スウェットパンツ姿で好きなテレビをつけ⸺”

translation.en: wearing your nice, comfy sweatpants."
This is Lassiter.
[Henry] There are shooters at your ten and two. Get up off of that chair. You will be AMF'ed.
translation.ja: 狙撃者が狙ってるぞ席を立ったら ＡＭＦだ

translation.en: Now, if I thought the world needed another me, I would've had a kid.
translation.ja: 俺ならクローンより子供を作る

translation.en: The program predates my arrival at the Agency. You must know that.
translation.ja: 私は計画を引き継いだだけよ

translation.en: Yeah. Perfect D.C. answer. Something goes wrong, duck!
translation.ja: 責任逃れが得意な役人らしい答えだ

translation.en: Tip the bike guy.
You can go.
[Henry] Now, I have your agent with me against her will.
translation.ja: お宅の捜査官を巻き込んだ

translation.en: Danielle Zakarewski. She wants to come in.
translation.ja: ダニー･ザカレウスキーだ復職を

translation.en: -[Janet] Fine. -Uh, like me, she is a patriot.
translation.ja: いいわ 俺と同じ愛国者だが⸺

translation.en: Unlike me,
she still wants to spend the next couple decades scoring touchdowns for you assholes.
translation.ja: この先もアホ上司のために敵と戦う気らしい

translation.en: Her safety is nonnegotiable.
translation.ja: 彼女の安全を約束しろ

translation.en: [Henry] Ten and two, Janet.
[Barista] Decaf soy latte with an extra shot for Janet.
translation.ja: ソイラテの お客様！

translation.en: [Henry] The only person I'll turn her over to
is the guy you sent after me in Cartagena. Don't even think about sending anybody else.
translation.ja: 俺の命を狙った奴をよこせ奴以外はダメだ

translation.en: Family reunion.
translation.ja: 父子の再会ってわけね

translation.en: -Very sweet. -Yeah. Keep it up.
translation.ja: 父子の再会ってわけね あんたは俺が無報酬で殺す最初の相手だ

translation.en: You'll be the first person I ever killed for free.
translation.ja: あんたは俺が無報酬で殺す最初の相手だ

translation.en: How quickly can you get him to Budapest?
[Janet] Five minutes?
Good.
She'll be in the courtyard of the Vajdahunyad Castle at midnight tonight.
translation.ja: 彼女は今夜０時城の中庭で待つ

translation.en: Enjoy your latte.
[Baron] What's AMF?
[Danny] "Adios, motherfucker."
[Henry] How the hell does he know we're here?
This is gonna work, right?
Yes.
How do you know?
I know his taste.
translation.ja: 奴の好みは 俺の好み

translation.en: Wait, are you saying you're attracted to me?
Me?
Now? Hell, no. But the younger, less-mature version, maybe.
translation.ja: まさか　もっと若い頃の俺なら その気になったかも

translation.en: When I came for you... in Georgia...
translation.ja: ジョージアで君を助けたのは⸺

translation.en: I didn't have to think about that. It was instinct.
translation.ja: 考えた末の行動じゃなく本能だった

translation.en: He was born with that, too.
Besides, he wants me.
translation.ja: それに 奴の標的は俺だ

translation.en: [Junior] Right.
[Danny] Lovely courtyard.
I'm sorry, ma'am. Before we go any farther, I'm gonna need you to strip.
translation.ja: 恐縮ですが服を脱いで頂けます？

translation.en: I beg your pardon?
I need to be certain you're not wearing a wire.
translation.ja: 盗聴機がないか調べます

translation.en: Okay, first of all... "ma'am"?
translation.ja: 丁寧ね私は そんなに年上？

translation.en: I was raised to respect my elders.
[Junior] Take your clothes off, please.
Turn around, please.
I see you like to be thorough.
Caution has kept me alive.
Call his burner.
-Thank you. -[dial tone beeping]
[Henry] Brogan.
In 12 minutes, I'm putting two bullets in the back of her head.
[Henry] Your orders are to deliver her safely.
translation.ja: 任務は彼女の護送だろ？

translation.en: My orders are to kill you.
translation.ja: 任務はあんたの殺害だ

translation.en: Are you familiar with the Quartz Chamber of the catacombs?
translation.ja: 地下墓所(カタコンベ)の“水晶の間”を？

translation.en: [Henry] Negative. We're doing this someplace visible, where I can see you.
translation.ja: 知らない　目の届く所にいろ

translation.en: Now you have 11 minutes.
Get dressed. We're taking a ride.
translation.ja: 服を着て　移動します

translation.en: [Danny] Cab was a smart move.
Where are you from?
Your formality, it's Southern.
You know, if you're gonna use me as bait and possibly murder me, then the least you can do is indulge me in some conversation.
translation.ja: 私をエサに使う気ならせめて返事ぐらいしたら？

translation.en: [Junior] Just outside Atlanta.
You two have a lot in common.
[Junior] I doubt that.
You'd be surprised.
You know, I started following him, too. Just like you're doing. Then I got to know him.
translation.ja: 監視してるうちに彼の人柄を知ったの

translation.en: He's got a big heart, like you.
translation.ja: 心が広い　あなたもね

translation.en: What do you know about my heart?
I know that you have one.
And I know that it's telling you that something about the job you've been given isn't right.
translation.ja: この仕事に疑問を持ってる

translation.en: A job is a job, ma'am.
[Danny] Wonder how much you paid the custodian.
translation.ja: ここに多額の寄付でも？

translation.en: -[dramatic music playing] -[Danny] Whoa!
[Junior] Left.
Undo the chain.
[Danny] Basement.
-You must really know the city. -[Junior] I watch a lot of Nat Geo.
translation.ja: 詳しいのね テレビ番組で見た

translation.en: -It says "Off-limits." -Ma'am.
translation.ja: 立ち入り禁止よ 開けて

translation.en: Wonder how many people are buried down here.
translation.ja: 何人 葬られてるのかしら

translation.en: [Junior] Stand over there.
[Junior] Go.
[Danny] If you knock out all the lights, how are you gonna see your own trip wire on the way out?
translation.ja: 暗闇だと自分も転ぶわよ

translation.en: A grenade is no joke. I mean, I get the idea.
Darkness neutralizes his biggest strength, and close quarters favors you, right?
translation.ja: 暗くて狭い場所で 銃はムリ

translation.en: I mean, he can't throw a grenade without killing me, too.
But what if he tries gas? You know, or some sort of sedative agent?
translation.ja: 相手が毒ガスとか鎮静ガスを使ったら？

translation.en: Way ahead of me. Gas mask and night vision.
translation.ja: ガスマスクに暗視ゴーグル？

translation.en: -Very smart. -[Junior] Over there.
And zip ties! These must be for me.
But can I ask you something?
[Junior] Would you actually stop talking long enough for me to answer?
translation.ja: それだけ しゃべってて？

translation.en: How much do you know about him?
Anybody tell you why they wanted him dead?
[Junior] Guy cracked, killed eight ops in a single night, -and his spotter. -That's what they told you?
translation.ja: 一晩に８人の狙撃員を殺し見張り番まで

translation.en: -[Junior] That's what he did. -No.
No, not exactly. I was there... the night all those operatives were hit.
translation.ja: あの晩 私は現場にいたの

translation.en: They'd been sent to kill him, and me, by Gemini.
translation.ja: ジェミニが彼と私を狙った

translation.en: And not that it matters, but his spotter was shot in Virginia, and the rest of those men went down in Savannah.
translation.ja: 狙撃員と見張り番が殺されたのは別の州よ

translation.en: Henry can shoot long-distance, but he can't shoot that long.
translation.ja: ヘンリーの弾が届くわけない

translation.en: [Danny] Come on. Just think. Does that make any sense to you?
translation.ja: よく考えて　納得できる？

translation.en: -[tape tearing] -[Danny] Do you understand what I'm saying? It-- it doesn't--
-[Junior] Better. -[muffled] Fuck you!
translation.ja: 黙って クソッタレ！

translation.en: [Henry] Get up. Go.
Stay right there.
-[sighs] Thank you. -[Henry] Here.
You know how to light one of those?
[Danny] Oh, Jesus, Henry.
Hey, thanks for the tip on the grenade.
translation.ja: 手投げ弾の話が役立った

translation.en: -You were talking to him the whole time. -[Henry] Yeah.
translation.ja: 話を聞いてたのか そうさ

translation.en: You either search somebody... or you don't.
translation.ja: ボディチェックが甘いぞ

translation.en: And for the record... I do not want to kill you.
translation.ja: いいか　お前を殺す気はない

translation.en: But I absolutely will if I have to.
What did Clay Verris tell you about me?
translation.ja: ヴェリスから何を聞いた？

translation.en: Okay. Well, let me tell you about him. Because I know Mr. Verris very well.
translation.ja: 俺が奴のことを話そう奴を よく知ってるから

translation.en: How'd he start you?
Hunting birds? Rabbit? About 12 years old, moved you up to deer?
translation.ja: 鳥やウサギを撃たせて12歳になるとシカに格上げ

translation.en: I'm guessing 19, 20 years old the first time he ordered you to shoot a person.
translation.ja: 19歳か20歳になると人間を標的にさせる

translation.en: Any of this ringing true?
Yeah.
He told you to "lean into your fear..."
because you were "a warrior, blessed with great gifts to defend the weak."
translation.ja: “弱い者を守る才能を生かし戦士になれ”と

translation.en: But he couldn't stop the noise...
that secret part of you that always felt a little different than everybody else.
translation.ja: 心の奥で絶えず感じてた“自分は人と違う”

translation.en: -Part that felt like a weirdo. -[takes deep breath] You don't know shit.
translation.ja: “普通の人間じゃない” うるさい

translation.en: Kid, I know you inside out and backwards.
You're allergic to bees. You hate cilantro. You always sneeze four times.
translation.ja: 蜂アレルギーでパクチー嫌いくしゃみは４回連続

translation.en: Everybody hates cilantro.
You're meticulous.
Thorough, disciplined, relentless.
translation.ja: 抜かりなく 何事も諦めない

translation.en: You love puzzles.
You're a chess player. Right?
translation.ja: とりわけ チェスがね

translation.en: Good, too, I bet.
But you suffer from insomnia. Your mind never lets you sleep.
translation.ja: だが不眠症で決して ぐっすり眠れない

translation.en: And even when it does, it attacks you with nightmares. I'm talking 'bout those three-o'clock-in-the-morning,
translation.ja: たとえ眠っても悪夢に襲われ夜中の３時に⸺

translation.en: somebody-please-save-me kind of nightmares.
translation.ja: 絶望的な気持ちで目が覚める

translation.en: And then there's the doubts, and those are the worst.
translation.ja: 最悪は湧き上がる疑惑だ

translation.en: You hate 'em, and you hate yourself for having 'em. They make you feel weak.
translation.ja: 疑惑は お前を弱くするだから それを憎む

translation.en: A real soldier doesn't doubt, right?
translation.ja: 本物の戦士に疑いはない

translation.en: The only time... you ever truly feel happy
translation.ja: お前が幸せを感じるのは腹ばいになり⸺

translation.en: is when you're flat on your belly about to squeeze a trigger.
translation.ja: 引き金を引く あの瞬間だ

translation.en: And in that moment... the world makes perfect sense.
translation.ja: その瞬間だけ生きてる歓びを感じる

translation.en: How do you think I know all of that?
I don't give a shit how you know anything.
translation.ja: 勝手に ほざいてろ

translation.en: Look at me... dummy!
Look at us!
Twenty-five years ago, your father took my blood and he cloned me.
translation.ja: 25年前 お前の父親は俺の血でクローンを造った

translation.en: He made you from me. Our DNA is identical.
translation.ja: つまり お前を造ったのだ ２人のＤＮＡは同じだ

translation.en: -He's telling you the truth. -Shut up.
[Henry] He chose me 'cause there's never been anybody like me.
And he knew one day I was gonna get old, and then you'd step in.
translation.ja: お前は 俺の後釜になる

translation.en: He's been lying to you the whole time. He told you, you were an orphan.
translation.ja: 奴は お前が孤児だと嘘を吹き込んできた

translation.en: And of all the people in the world to come after me,
translation.ja: 俺を殺るのに お前を選んだ

translation.en: -why would he send you? -Because I'm the best.
translation.ja: 俺を殺るのに お前を選んだ 腕がいいから

translation.en: You are obviously not the best.
translation.ja: 今夜 証明できたか？

translation.en: [exhales] You got a hard-ass head.
I guess this was supposed to be your birthday or something.
translation.ja: 俺を殺せというのは息子への⸺

translation.en: I had to die, and you had to do it.
As long as I was alive, somehow Clay's little experiment was incomplete.
translation.ja: だが俺は生きてる奴の実験は失敗したんだ

translation.en: That's the maniac you're pulling a trigger for.
translation.ja: そういう奴の言いなりか

translation.en: Shut your mouth about him.
translation.ja: そんな言葉には乗らないぞ

translation.en: -You're just trying to rattle me. -I'm trying to save you!
translation.ja: そんな言葉には乗らないぞ お前を救いたい！

translation.en: [exhales sharply] What are you... twenty-three?
Still a virgin, right?
Dying to be in a relationship and connect, but terrified to let anybody near you.
translation.ja: 恋人は欲しいけど女を近づけることが怖い

translation.en: Because what if somebody actually saw... who you are?
translation.ja: 正体を見破られ愛されないことを⸺

translation.en: How could they love you?
So, everybody's just targets...
translation.ja: だから他人は皆 標的

translation.en: and you're just a weapon.
-[Danny] Hey! -[both grunt]
[grunts] Don't shoot him!
[Henry] Don't shoot him!
-[Danny] Don't! No! Don't! Drop it! -[Henry grunts]
Drop it! I will shoot you!
-[groans] -No, you won't!
Let him go!
Right now!
[Junior] I'm not you!
[Junior] You hear me, old man?
I'm not you!
translation.ja: 僕は あんたじゃない

translation.en: -[Henry] Where is he? [groans] -[Danny] He's gone.
-[Henry] Did you hit him? -I think so, yeah.
-[groans] Where? -Shoulder, I think.
Then he'll recover.
Is that a good thing?
it's not every day you see a guy
get his ass kicked on two continents... -[Henry continues groaning] -...by himself.
translation.ja: “自分自身”にやられる奴は少ない

translation.en: Where to?
Georgia.
It's where Verris is.
[Henry sighing] Man.
That poor kid.
He must be terrified.
And he's going home, walking into a buzz saw.
translation.ja: 帰っても針のむしろだ

translation.en: I need to get some sleep. You, too.
translation.ja: 少し眠るわ　あなたも

translation.en: Mm. Not me. That's where the ghosts are.
translation.ja: ゴーストが夢に現れる

translation.en: Sleep.
[Clay] Tell me something.
Why is it so hard for you to kill this man?
translation.ja: なぜ あいつを殺せない

translation.en: [Junior] You know how much I hate... Big Hammock Park, Pop?
translation.ja: ビッグ･ハンモック･パークが大嫌いだった

translation.en: What?
[Junior] Ever since I was about 12 years old...
translation.ja: 12歳の頃から誕生日が来ると⸺

translation.en: we would shoot turkeys there... for my birthday.
translation.ja: 七面鳥を撃ちにパークに連れていかれた

translation.en: And I always hated it.
But I was an orphan, right? So, how would we e-- even know when my birthday was?
translation.ja: 孤児なのに 誕生日がいつかどうして分かる？

translation.en: But you never seemed to notice, so we just... keep going.
translation.ja: 父さんは そんなことお構いなし

translation.en: Okay. So, next year, we'll try Chuck E. Cheese.
translation.ja: 来年はピザ屋で祝おう

translation.en: Yeah.
You, me, and the lab guys... who made me.
translation.ja: 父さんと 僕を造った研究所の連中と一緒にね

translation.en: Oh.
Yeah.
I, um...
always believed...
you'd be happier not knowing.
Happy.
You know when I'm happy, Pop?
When I'm flat on my belly... about to squeeze a trigger.
translation.ja: 腹ばいになって銃の引き金を引く瞬間だ

translation.en: It's the only time I'm happy.
And this wasn't even a mistake.
It's not like you got someone pregnant, and then had to man up...
translation.ja: 仕方なく引き取って育てたわけじゃないだろ？

translation.en: and raise me. No, you...
translation.ja: 仕方なく引き取って育てたわけじゃないだろ？ 父さんは科学者を雇って⸺

translation.en: made a decision...
translation.ja: 父さんは科学者を雇って⸺

translation.en: to have a scientist make a person
translation.ja: 人間から人間を造ることを選んだんだ

translation.en: -out of another person-- -No, that's not what it was.
translation.ja: 人間から人間を造ることを選んだんだ 違う

translation.en: That's exactly what it was.
Then you sent me...
to kill him. Of all the shooters in the world,
translation.ja: 命令した 他の者ではなくなぜ僕を指名した？

translation.en: why would you send me?
translation.ja: 他の者ではなくなぜ僕を指名した？

translation.en: He's your darkness. You had to walk through this on your own.
translation.ja: 自らの闇と直面させたかった

translation.en: Maybe you're my darkness.
That lie you told me...
translation.ja: 父さんに聞かされた嘘

translation.en: that my parents...
dumped me... at a fire station.
translation.ja: 消防署の前に僕を捨てた？

translation.en: And I believed that.
-Do you know how that made me feel? -It was a necessary lie.
translation.ja: どれほど傷ついたか 必要な嘘だった

translation.en: None of this shit is necessary!
translation.ja: そんな言い訳は よせ

translation.en: You made a choice to do this to me. Can't you see how not okay I am?
translation.ja: そういうことをされて僕が苦しまないとでも？

translation.en: Bullshit!
You forget who you're talking to, Junior. I've seen battle.
translation.ja: お前は分かってない 私は過酷な戦場に送られ⸺

translation.en: I've seen soldiers go over the edge, because more was being asked of them
translation.ja: 私は過酷な戦場に送られ⸺ 精神が壊れていく兵士を見た

translation.en: than they could give. That's not you.
translation.ja: 精神が壊れていく兵士を見た

translation.en: Your world is stable and dependable. I made sure of that.
translation.ja: だが お前の世界は揺るがず 安定してる

translation.en: You have something that Henry himself never had.
translation.ja: ヘンリーを超えたのだ

translation.en: You have a loving, dedicated, present
translation.ja: 愛情深く絶えず支えとなる父がいる

translation.en: father, who tells you every goddamn day that you are precious and that you matter.
translation.ja: その父は誰よりもお前を愛してる

translation.en: Jesus, the whole point of this thing...
translation.ja: ヘンリーの才能を持ち⸺

translation.en: was to give you all of Henry's gifts without his pain, and I did.
translation.ja: しかも迷いのない男に育て上げたのだ

translation.en: Don't... doubt, Junior.
translation.ja: 決して疑いを持つなジュニア

translation.en: You're better than that.
Come here.
I love you, son.
Just don't let yourself down.
[Baron] Like so many of my encounters, it was short but sweet.
translation.ja: 短い付き合いだが最高だった

translation.en: Thanks, baby.
[Baron] There should be a truck here somewhere.
[Junior] Don't move.
-[groans] -What was in that?
Bee venom.
[Danny] No. No, you can't do that.
-You can't do that. He's allergic! -[Baron] Henry...
-can you breathe? Henry, try to breathe. -[chokes]
translation.ja: ヘンリー　息をするんだ

translation.en: -[Baron] You okay? -Please.
[Baron] Henry.
translation.ja: ヘンリー　息をしろ

translation.en: -Henry, can you breathe? -[Danny] Please!
translation.ja: ヘンリー　息をしろ 助けて

translation.en: -[Baron] Try to breathe. Henry! Henry! -[wheezes]
translation.ja: 息をしろ　ヘンリー！

translation.en: [Baron] Breathe!
-[Danny] Why are you doing this? -[Baron] Come on, Henry.
-[Danny] Why are you doing this? -[Baron] Henry.
-Henry, breathe. Come on! -[wheezes]
translation.ja: ヘンリー　息をしろ

translation.en: Breathe, Henry.
Epinephrine antihistamine.
translation.ja: エピネフリンと抗ヒスタミン剤だ

translation.en: -[sighs] -[Junior] You'll be fine.
I'm sorry. I had to be sure.
translation.ja: 悪いな　体質を確かめた

translation.en: No, it's all good. This whole shit has been a little difficult.
translation.ja: 謝るな　互いに初めての状況だから

translation.en: [Baron] I hate to break up the party, but...
how the hell do you always know where we are?
[Junior] They're tracking you.
Do you trust me?
[Junior] They chipped you... during your surgery three years ago.
translation.ja: ３年前の手術の時埋め込まれた

translation.en: Verris.
You know him, too?
Panama. Kuwait. Somalia.
translation.ja: パナマやソマリアに一緒に行った

translation.en: Can you take us to him?
[Henry] We need to shut him down. -Both of us. -[dramatic music playing]
translation.ja: お前も奴を潰したいだろ？

translation.en: You grew up in Philadelphia, right?
translation.ja: フィラデルフィア育ち？

translation.en: Yep. Place called "The Bottom."
The Bottom.
Tell me about my mother.
Helen Jackson Brogan. Worked two jobs for 40 years.
translation.ja: ヘレン･ジャクソン･ブローガンは働きづめで⸺

translation.en: That woman used to whoop my ass.
translation.ja: 俺のケツをよく叩いた

translation.en: Did you deserve it?
Usually. Does being angry and stupid
translation.ja: まあね 反抗的で バカで何にも意欲を示さなかった

translation.en: and never really trying at anything mean you deserve it?
translation.ja: 反抗的で バカで何にも意欲を示さなかった

translation.en: Our father wasn't around much. He left when I was five.
translation.ja: 親父は 俺が５歳の時に出て行った

translation.en: And I think every time she looked at me, she just saw him, so...
translation.ja: お袋は その怒りを俺にぶつけた

translation.en: I had to get the hell out of there. Joined the corps.
translation.ja: 俺は家を飛び出して海兵隊に入った

translation.en: -First time I ever made any real friends. -Hoorah.
translation.ja: 初めて友達もできた 俺とか

translation.en: Met Clay Verris there.
Found something I was really, really good at.
translation.ja: 俺は自分の才能に目覚めて⸺

translation.en: Time I left, I had medals on my chest...
translation.ja: 勲章をぶらさげて退役

translation.en: she was gone, and... I had become this.
translation.ja: すでにお袋は死んでて今の俺に至る

translation.en: You gotta walk away... while you still can.
translation.ja: お前は方向転換ができる

translation.en: -This is all I know. -No, this is all he taught you.
translation.ja: 道がない 教え込まれたことを忘れて新しい生き方を探すんだ

translation.en: Stop now, you can still... -become something else. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: 教え込まれたことを忘れて新しい生き方を探すんだ

translation.en: Sure.
A doctor?
-Lawyer? -Husband.
Father.
All the things this job gives you the excuse not to be.
translation.ja: 今まで仕事のせいでできなかったことを

translation.en: I threw all of that away.
translation.ja: 俺は やらなかった

translation.en: It'd be a shame to waste these gifts a second time around.
translation.ja: 今は それを後悔してる

translation.en: I'm sorry, what is your name?
It's always been Junior.
Clay Junior.
I don't really know anymore.
That's another really good reason to quit.
[Junior] You sure about this?
[Henry] I need to talk to him.
So, what happens when we get to him?
translation.ja: 彼に会って その先は？

translation.en: He's not gonna surrender.
It's him.
[Baron] Can I talk to him? I want to be the one to tell him we're all BFFs now.
translation.ja: “ジュニアが寝返った”と聞かせたい

translation.en: -[cell phone continues to ring] -Take it.
-This is Junior. -[Clay] Are you with Brogan?
translation.ja: 僕だ ブローガンと？

translation.en: Why would I be with him? You sent me to kill him, didn't you?
[Clay] Doesn't matter. Just run.
-What? -[Clay] Run. Get away from him, now.
translation.ja: 何？ 早く そこを離れろ

translation.en: -Junior, I just want you safe. -[Junior] Why?
Because I'm your favorite experiment?
translation.ja: 貴重な実験サンプルだから？

translation.en: [Clay] No, because I'm your father and you need to listen to me. Run!
translation.ja: お前の父親だから言うのだ 逃げろ！

translation.en: -[Junior] Get out of the car! -[Henry] Go, go!
Baron! [pants] No!
[Danny] Come on!
I'm sorry, Henry.
-[Clay] Chief Mitchell? -[Mitchell] Go ahead.
Clay Verris. I need your units to stand down.
translation.ja: ヴェリスだ全員 待機させろ

translation.en: -[Mitchell] Sir? -We're engaging with a terror cell that has a weaponized biological capability.
translation.ja: 我々の相手は生物兵器を備えたテロ集団だ

translation.en: [Mitchell] All units, fall back immediately.
translation.ja: 全員 即刻退避しろ

translation.en: [Clay] Federal authorities have been notified and are en route.
translation.ja: 連邦担当官が じき到着する

translation.en: [Mitchell] Affirmative. Keep me posted, Clay.
[Clay] Yes, sir.
[Junior] You gotta stand your men down now.
You did the right thing, Junior, walking away from him.
translation.ja: いいぞ　あいつを捨てたか

translation.en: I did what a coward would do.
translation.ja: 腰抜けのやることだ恥ずかしい！

translation.en: -Makes me sick! -I was asking too much of you.
translation.ja: 腰抜けのやることだ恥ずかしい！ 私はお前を買いかぶりすぎてた

translation.en: I can see that now.
translation.ja: 私はお前を買いかぶりすぎてた

translation.en: He deserves better than a missile shot into his car, Pop.
translation.ja: ミサイルを撃ち込むなんて

translation.en: It doesn't matter what he deserves. He has to die.
translation.ja: 手段はどうあれ奴を殺すのだ

translation.en: -Are you gonna call those goons off now? -No. But you can.
translation.ja: 攻撃を中止させて お前が命令しろ

translation.en: Just fire that. Take command.
translation.ja: 私を撃って これを使え

translation.en: [Henry] Armor is weak at the joints. Eyes and neck are the kill shots.
translation.ja: 奴らの弱点を狙え眼か首だ

translation.en: Take right, I take left.
[Henry] Muzzle discipline.
Watch your round count. You set, I spike.
translation.ja: 互いに援護し合おう行くぞ

translation.en: -Ready? -Roger that.
-[Danny] I'm out! -[Henry] Take cover!
Set!
[Danny] Frag out!
-I am trying to make you a man! -[grunts]
translation.ja: いつになったら一人前になるんだ！

translation.en: I should've cloned myself.
"Loving, dedicated, present father."
translation.ja: “愛情深く絶えず支えになる父”か

translation.en: Go ahead.
Do it.
How many rounds you got left? [pants]
One.
Okay.
I'm sorry.
For what?
-For getting you into this. -I was the one surveilling you.
translation.ja: 君を巻き込んだ 監視役だから

translation.en: Anyway... sorry.
Now let's fight our way out of this thing.
translation.ja: 絶対に生き延びるわよ

translation.en: You're a great partner.
[Henry] Thank you.
Sorry I ran.
Yeah, well, it's been a rough night. How many more out there?
translation.ja: 大変な夜だった　外に敵は？

translation.en: I didn't see any.
[Henry] Verris?
Out of commission.
But still alive?
Yes.
Here.
How bad is that?
I'm fine.
You're not.
Hold the elevated position. We're gonna secure an out.
Back off!
Don't you feel pain?
[Clay] I don't know why you're so angry, -Henry. -[guns cock]
translation.ja: 君が怒るのは おかしい

translation.en: You were the inspiration for all of this.
translation.ja: 君から着想を得た計画だ

translation.en: You know where I got the idea? Are you okay?
translation.ja: あの時だよ 無事か？

translation.en: Khafji.
Watching you go house to house, wishing I had a whole division of men
translation.ja: 君の果敢な働きを見て⸺

translation.en: all as good as you. Wondering if that could be possible.
translation.ja: 君と同等の兵を集めた隊なら最強だと思った

translation.en: -You should be flattered. -[scoffs]
You should be dead.
[Clay] You saw what happened over there.
Atrocities.
Friends being sent home in a pine box.
translation.ja: 棺(ひつぎ)で祖国に戻る戦友を⸺

translation.en: Why should we accept that... if there's a better way?
translation.ja: これ以上出さずにすむ方法がある

translation.en: And look what we created.
He's got both of us in him.
Don't you think your country deserves...
translation.ja: 君の完璧なコピーをこの国は持つべきだ

translation.en: -perfect version of you? -There is no perfect version of me.
translation.ja: 君の完璧なコピーをこの国は持つべきだ 俺の完璧なコピーなどない彼のも 誰のコピーも

translation.en: Or him. Or anybody.
translation.ja: 俺の完璧なコピーなどない彼のも 誰のコピーも

translation.en: [Clay] No?
He was on his way to Yemen. Now, thanks to you, his place is gonna be taken by someone with parents.
translation.ja: こいつの代わりに別の兵士が戦地に送られた

translation.en: Someone who feels pain... fear,
translation.ja: 彼は痛みや恐怖を感じるがこいつは無感覚だ

translation.en: which we had edited out of him. Someone with just as many weaknesses
translation.ja: 彼は痛みや恐怖を感じるがこいつは無感覚だ 弱みや欠点を持った兵士を送り込む方が いいとでも？

translation.en: as the terrorists that we're trying to kill. And you're gonna tell me that's better?
translation.ja: 弱みや欠点を持った兵士を送り込む方が いいとでも？

translation.en: So, why not make a whole army of them?
Yeah. Why not?
Think how many American families we could spare.
translation.ja: 家族の悲劇がなくなる

translation.en: Nobody's son or daughter would ever have to die.
translation.ja: 息子や娘が戦死することも⸺

translation.en: No vet comes home with PTSD and kills himself.
translation.ja: ＰＴＳＤで自殺することもなくなる

translation.en: We can keep the whole world safe without any actual grief.
translation.ja: 悲しみの涙を流す者がいない世界をつくることが

translation.en: So, who would I be hurting?
translation.ja: 悲しみの涙を流す者がいない世界をつくることが 悪いのか？

translation.en: You're talking about people, Clay.
translation.ja: クローンはどうでもいいと？

translation.en: Henry...
this is the most humane thing that Gemini's ever done.
translation.ja: 人道主義を奉じる組織だ

translation.en: How many more of me are running around out there?
translation.ja: 僕は あと何人いるんだ？

translation.en: There's only one you, Junior.
translation.ja: お前しかいないよ　ジュニア

translation.en: He was a weapon. You're my son.
translation.ja: こいつは武器お前は私の息子だ

translation.en: And I love you...
as much as any father ever loved any kid.
translation.ja: どんな父親よりも深く愛してる

translation.en: I don't have a father.
Goodbye, Clay.
[Henry] Hey, hey.
Uh-huh.
So, what the hell are we gonna do, huh?
Gonna turn him in? They're not gonna try him. They're not gonna shut down his lab.
translation.ja: 警察に引き渡しても裁きは下らない

translation.en: -We have to end this right now. -[Henry] Hey.
translation.ja: ここで決着をつける 待て

translation.en: Look at me.
Look at me.
You pull that trigger,
and you're gonna break something inside of yourself...
that'll never get fixed again.
Don't.
Let it go.
Give it to me.
You don't want those ghosts. Trust me.
translation.ja: ゴーストにつきまとわれたいか？

translation.en: [Henry] You should know better than that.
Surprised you give a shit.
Well, we can't be friends anymore.
translation.ja: あんたとは友達には戻れない

translation.en: Because you did let them try to kill me.
But doesn't mean I want to see you drink yourself to death.
translation.ja: だが酒に溺れ死ぬ姿は見たくない

translation.en: The Gemini lab's been dismantled. Cloning program is history.
translation.ja: ジェミニの研究所は解体クローン計画は無に帰した

translation.en: And Junior?
He's untouchable.
No one will bother him... ever.
And we checked. There are no more clones.
translation.ja: クローンは もういない

translation.en: What about you?
IG called.
I'm looking at charges, but if I bury Janet... I can make a deal.
translation.ja: ラシターについて証言すれば司法取引できる

translation.en: Well, she earned it.
I'm really sorry, Henry.
translation.ja: 悪かった　ヘンリー

translation.en: -Take care, Del. -Yeah. You, too.
And happy retirement.
[Danny] Hey.
[Henry] Hey.
Good to see you.
Uh, congrats on the promotion. I hear they got big plans.
translation.ja: 昇進おめでとう大変な計画らしいな

translation.en: Well, after you, -pretty sure I can handle anything. -[Henry chuckles]
translation.ja: あの後だから“何でも来い”よ

translation.en: How have you been?
Good. I just, uh, settled Baron's estate, scattered his ashes in the Caribbean.
translation.ja: バロンの家財を始末して遺灰をカリブ海に撒(ま)いた

translation.en: I don't know. All I want to do now is put some good in the world. I just got to figure out how.
translation.ja: 今は世界をよくするために何かしたいと考えている

translation.en: -Yeah, you will. -Hmm.
You sleeping okay?
Uh, better.
-No ghosts? -Not like before.
translation.ja: ゴーストは？ 前ほどじゃない鏡で自分の顔も見た

translation.en: And I actually looked in a mirror the other day.
translation.ja: 前ほどじゃない鏡で自分の顔も見た

translation.en: -Really? -It wasn't horrendous.
translation.ja: 本当？ 恐怖は感じなかった

translation.en: Speaking of mirrors...
-[Junior] Catch you later. -[boy] See you later, man.
-What's this? -This is you.
translation.ja: それは？ お前のＩＤだ　パスポート出生証明書　運転免許証

translation.en: Passport, birth certificate, driver's license.
translation.ja: お前のＩＤだ　パスポート出生証明書　運転免許証

translation.en: -Apparently you got pretty good credit. -[chuckles]
I love the name you chose.
Jackson?
translation.ja: “ジャクソン”　お袋の名だ

translation.en: -It was my mother's name. -Hey, she was my mother first.
translation.ja: “ジャクソン”　お袋の名だ 俺のお袋でもある

translation.en: -[chuckles] Yeah, yeah. -Don't you "yeah, yeah" me, young man.
translation.ja: はいはい 生意気な口をきくな

translation.en: Come on. I know a great place for lunch.
-So, you settled on a major yet? -Oh, leaning towards engineering.
translation.ja: 専攻学科は？ 工学かな

translation.en: -Engineering? -Uh.
Yeah, you should listen to her.
Uh, if I were you, which I sort of am, I'd go with computer science.
translation.ja: 俺なら…って俺だけどコンピューター工学を選ぶ

translation.en: [Danny] Save that for grad school.
translation.ja: それより先に人文学を…

translation.en: -You want to start in humanities. -Okay, don't listen to her.
translation.ja: それより先に人文学を… 無視しろ

translation.en: -Don't listen to him. -Guys?
-You need a grounding in the classics. -Well, excuse me,
translation.ja: 古典を読まなきゃ 彼と俺は同意見だ

translation.en: -I'm trying to talk with myself here. -Guys.
You're talking to yourself, but you're not talking to him.
translation.ja: 彼には彼の考えがある

translation.en: Look, I-- I just made a lot of mistakes when I was young--
And I'd actually like to make some of those mistakes myself.
translation.ja: 僕は失敗も経験してみたいんだ

translation.en: What I'm trying to say is, I made them already, so you don't have to.
translation.ja: 同じ失敗を繰り返す必要はない

translation.en: -Yeah, but he's not you. -[Junior] Okay, everybody.
translation.ja: 彼は未経験 いいか ２人とも落ち着いてくれ

translation.en: Chill the hell out.
translation.ja: いいか ２人とも落ち着いてくれ

translation.en: I'm gonna be okay.
If you're okay...
I'm okay.
-[chuckles] -[Henry] What?
I just can't believe that in 30 years, I'm gonna look like you.
translation.ja: 30年後の自分がこんな風になるとはね…

translation.en: -What? Please. You wish. -[Junior chuckling]
translation.ja: おいおい　油断するなよ

translation.en: Boy, you better hope you look like me in-- in 30 years.
translation.ja: 俺みたいになれたら大したもんだ

translation.en: This is 50-year-old, mature man meat you're looking at.
translation.ja: 俺は成熟した50歳の男だぞ この見事な体を見ろ

translation.en: -[Danny] Fifty-one. -[Henry] I brush, I floss, I work hard.
translation.ja: 51歳よ 歯のケアも体力作りも手を抜かない

translation.en: When you're 50, I bet you won't be dragging your ass around the track every morning like I do.
translation.ja: 50を過ぎても毎朝トラックを走っている

translation.en: In fact, we can race now.
We can race right now. We'll take it to the corner right now.
translation.ja: 今ここで走ってみよう
